Evans (now SNGLloyd 395, SNGOxford 729, 734, 737, 754-6, 764, 768, 772, 774-8, 780-92); New York 7 (SNG2, 507-12, 517) â€ Evans, NC 1918, pp. 133-54, illus. Sambon, Miscellanea Num. 1921, p. 33 with drawing of one coin Vlasto, NC 1930, p. 110, for provenance Stazio, AIIN 1965-7, pp. 48, 52-3 Sambon provides an indifferent drawing of a previously unknown type of Meta- pontum, the same coin illustrated by Evans on pl. 5, 4. This link, as well as the similarity of contents and dates of discovery, makes it clear that the hd. described briefly by Sambon (Noe 128) is the same as that later and more fully published by Evans (N. 897)
